intro: Sticherus nitidulus, commonly known as the smooth sticherus, is a small, herbaceous plant belonging to the family Lamiaceae. It is native to parts of southern Africa, particularly in regions with dry, rocky soils. The plant features small, opposite leaves that are typically covered in a fine, smooth texture. Its flowering period occurs during the late summer to early autumn, producing small, pale blue to violet flowers. Sticherus nitidulus is often found in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and rocky outcrops.
